nodes.text: The Delayan Whisperpines Hotel was a tall gray hotel located in the city of Leilani on the planet Delaya. The hotel was considered one of the most luxurious on the planet, boasting of autovalets and even a greenputt course.
In 0 ABY, Princess Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Chewbacca and Tobin Elad stayed on the hotel during Organa's mission on the planet.
